participant_1.background:

I like to spend time alone, pursuing my own interests.
my family gets together every saturday.
i started a new job this year , which is helping me learn more about socialization.

content.text: Hey, what do you do for fun?
I like to look at my collection of mermaid books and imagine swimming with them.
That's really neat! I like to read about mythology too.
Oh, that's cool! What's your favorite mythology?
I think I like Greek mythology the best. The stories are so interesting.
I like Greek mythology too! I like the story of Perseus and Medusa.
Oh, that's a good one! I also like the story of Orpheus and Eurydice.
Those are both great stories! I also like the story of Theseus and the Minotaur.
Oh, that's a good one too! I think my favorite story is the story of Pandora and the Box.
Oh, that's a good one! I love the ending of that story.
Me too! It's so sad, but also so hopeful.
I agree! It's a really good story.
It is! I'm glad we had this conversation.
Me too! I love talking about mythology.
Me too! I think it's so interesting.
Me too! I wish I could learn more about it.
Me too! Maybe we can find some books to read about it.
That would be great! I'd love to learn more.
